entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 10:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

Humidity: 80 %

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
